amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to encourage freight planning and investment that incorporates all modes of transportation, including rail, waterways, ports, and highways to promote national connectivity.

vote.text: Amendment SA 721 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 721 proposed by Senator Booker. (consideration: CR S1982-1983; text: CR S1982-1983) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to encourage freight planning and investment that incorporates all modes of transportation, including rail, waterways, ports, and highways to promote national connectivity.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 721 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 721 proposed by Senator Booker.
